name: Axel in Harlem: The Game
description:
Note: This game is COMPLETELY SFW if you do wonder it.
It is just a short meme game.
Be sure to join my Discord Server for updates, support, and community talk.
I'd really appreciate your message over anything you want to express! :D

Have you ever wanted to play the role of Axel?
No?
Well, too bad!

You're the chosen one to help him gather homies for... his "night parties".
Guide him to victory with your sweet sweet arrow keys (or WADS for Minecraft players, don't want to disappoint them), before the time runs out!

Although, there may be minor, tiny, small, little problems... Axel gets so quirky at night that his movements are rather... sonic. Oh, and possible death too.
BUT, I'm suuuure you'll be fine!
Him in the flesh chose you, so don't disappoint him!

This game was made in 2 days as a late 2023 april fool special occasion and meme, I hope you do enjoy it!
Everything belongs to their original creators, no copyright infringements are intended.
"Axel in Harlem" by Animan Studios, "Ballin'" by Mustard and Roddy Rich.
